summary: On a Caribbean cruise, Jenny is marooned on a beach with her rock and roll idol. Deliriously in love with the idea of time alone with him, she manages to hide the fact that they're a stone's throw away from their resort.
cast: Amanda Bynes|Chris Carmack|Jonathan Bennett|Jamie-Lynn Sigler|Susan Duerden|Fred Willard|Jackie Long|Joey Kern|Lance Bass|Kathy Griffin|Alfonso Ribeiro|Connor Matheus|Suzanne Kent|Caleb Moody|Lou Erickson|Kelly Wagner|Sabrina Kurzman|Tim Fitzgerald|Tania Imbert|Joan Marie Bobea|Brian Peck|Marie-Ange Ripka|Michael Ridley|Tim Hall|Craig Modderno|Bolivar Soto|Jennifer Levine|Jesse Tannen|Tamara Birkemoe|Leonardo Cuesta|Jason Johnson|Gary Sullivan|Brian To|Robert Velo|Gary J. keywords: catfight|caribbean island|blondie|woman wears a bikini|woman wears a red dress
title: Mi ligue en apuros
